title: Chapter 2808: Chapter 1499: Temporarily Bewitched Qiao Yusheng, Brazenly Digs At Elder Zhong_4
body:
Chapter 2808: Chapter 1499: Temporarily Bewitched Qiao Yusheng, Brazenly Digs At Elder Zhong_4

Chapter 2808: Chapter 1499: Temporarily Bewitched Qiao Yusheng, Brazenly Digs at Elder Zhong_4

But at the moment…

In hindsight, Xu Xiaoshou never even returned after Elder Qiao’s sanctification. How could he possibly be delayed for too long by matters outside this battleground?

Suddenly regaining his focus, withdrawing from those perceptions that directly pointed to the source of the Great Path, Xu Xiaoshou felt he had returned to his “human” self.

What was the point of merging with the Great Path?

The secular world brought true happiness!

“Xu Xiaoshou…”

After the Cutting Path stage, the first to aggressively approach him was not one of his own, but an inexplicably excited Zhong Yuanzi.

He grasped Xu Xiaoshou’s hand, his gaze fixated on his feet, blurting out, “The Diagram, that Great Path Diagram, I know… no, I don’t quite understand… I feel…”

Xu Xiaoshou clasped the explosive-haired hand and said earnestly, “Elder Zhong, I know you like me a lot, but we are on opposing sides right now, and if you get too close, Dao Xuanji will sever your arm.”

Those words suddenly jolted everyone back to reality!

Yes, mesmerized by Xu Xiaoshou’s breakthrough, they had forgotten the main point—the ongoing battle between the Saint Servants and the Holy Divine Palace was still not over!

Zhong Yuanzi still wanted to say something.

Xu Xiaoshou slightly shook his head, releasing his hand, “If you have any questions, save them for the First Pavilion in the Sky.”

He slightly moved his fingertips.

Without a ripple in heaven and earth or a wave in the Dao,

the space enveloped them, casting a frozen projection of Zhong Yuanzi and Xu Xiaoshou at the spot, while Xu Xiaoshou pulled Zhong Yuanzi into another simply constructed, unperceived extradimensional space.

It truly became one…

Realizing he could now easily create extradimensional spaces on a whim, Xu Xiaoshou was astounded by the power of Spatial Upanishad.

Knowing time was of the essence, he hurriedly stuffed something into Zhong Yuanzi’s palm.

“This is…”

The spatial projection, spatial coverage, extradimensional space vanished.

None at the scene sensed anything amiss, except for the ancient swordsmen proficient in Fantasy Sword Technique and practicing Space-Time Transition, who noticed something.

But it was only a slight spatial fluctuation they perceived; what exactly happened was beyond their comprehension.

An overtly filthy transaction!

Xu Xiaoshou, after scanning the crowd’s reactions, suddenly got excited.

He could now even think about pulling down his pants in front of everyone and peeing… cough, what was he thinking? The second true body was indeed disgusting!

Zhong Yuanzi looked slightly stunned, lowering his head as he returned to Fang Wenxin’s side, his eyes complicated.

“What’s wrong?” Fang Wenxin asked, frowning.

“Nothing…”

“Don’t get too close to him, he is after all a person of the Saint Servants!”

“I know…”

Zhong Yuanzi of course knew everything, but when comparing his path-seeking heart with his position, which weighed more, which weighed less?

He clenched his fists, his fingertips gently caressing his palm.

As an Elemental Divine Envoy, Zhong Yuanzi possessed both space and blood attributes.

He could clearly sense that within the micro blood particles in the depths of his palm’s blood vessels, a small extradimensional space had been created.

Unnoticed by anyone.

Even if a demi-saint arrived, they would not know.

But within that space, a jade talisman was deposited, given by Xu Xiaoshou, supposedly leading to that “Apricot Realm”?

Zhong Yuanzi discreetly glanced at Sacred Mountain Gui Zhe.

If Hallmaster Dao was still around, he wouldn’t hesitate a bit; joining forces to capture Xu Xiaoshou and bringing him to the sacred mountain would be his first priority.

Why enter the First Pavilion in the Sky?

The Holy Divine Palace was a perfect place for research, and Hallmaster Dao would take care of the external trivial matters.

Now, Zhong Yuanzi found himself faced with a difficult choice:

“Apricot Realm…”

“Should I go take a look?”
